original_text: When Peter arrived at the house, Cornelius went out to meet him. He went down on his knees in front of Peter to worship him.
korean_text: 마침 베드로가 들어올 때에 고넬료가 맞아 발 앞에 엎드리어 절하니

sentences.original_text: When Peter arrived at the house
Cornelius went out to meet him
He went down on his knees in front of Peter
